mapper.select: select a.AdultNumber, a.BabyNumber, a.OldNumber, a.ChildNumber from OrderDetailed a join Orders b on a.OrderId = b.Id where a.PayType = 2 and b.CreateUserId = #{Id}

select a.GuideName,a.OutDate,a.LineName,c.Tel,(a.SettlementPrice - b.AllOutPrice) as 'InPrice', (a.SubstitutionPrice - b.AllOutPrice) as 'FinallyPrice',b.AllOutPrice from Income a join Outcome b on a.Id = b.IncomeId join SystemUser c on a.CreateUserId = c.Id
